dcterms:creator: K. Forster
D. Roggen
G. Troster
dcterms:description: The HCI gesture recognition dataset consists of a user performing 5 different gestures using the right arm. Data is obtained from 8 IMUs placed on the arm, including gestures like drawing triangle up, circle, infinity, square, and triangle down, along with a null case.
dcterms:title: HCI Gesture Recognition Dataset

dcterms:creator: K. Forster
D. Roggen
G. Troster
dcterms:description: The WISDM activity recognition dataset consists of 36 users performing 6 activities including running, walking, ascending stairs, descending stairs, sitting, and standing. Data is collected through an accelerometer mounted on the participantâ€™s chest.
dcterms:title: WISDM Activity Recognition Dataset

dcterms:creator: L. Glass
M. Mackey
dcterms:description: The Mackay-Glass equation dataset is generated from a nonlinear time delay differential equation, which is used to create sequences that exhibit class membership based on parameter settings.
dcterms:title: Mackay-Glass Equation Dataset
